question: As per the Corporate Affairs Ministry, Companies (Auditor’s Report) Order, 2020 would come into effect from which date?
explanation:
According to a notification issued by the Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA), the Companies (Auditor’s Report) Order, 2020 would come into effect from the financial years commencing on or after April 1, 2021.
The CARO 2020, is the new format of the Companies Order, which requires the companies to comply with stricter disclosure requirements on various issues. This aims to promote transparency and due diligence in the financial affairs of the companies.
